channel.title: Entrepreneurship on KUMSC

item.title: HamroNiwas Entrepreneurship 101 Workshop
item.description: Are you a Kathmandu University student eager to dive into the world of entrepreneurship? Look no further! HamroNiwas, your go-to hub for all things KU-related, is excited to announce an exclusive Entrepreneurship 101 Workshop just for you.
